title: "What is Covered in Swiss Version Day One to Six of a Basic Magnetism Course?"
first_phrase: In the final part of this course, we delve into advanced exercises for hypnosis and magnetism. Over the past few days, the students learned basic exercises such as Magnetic Passes, Arkeos Mirror, and Healing with Magnetism. They also practiced regression and crisis management, and learned different states of animal magnetisms such as fascination, lethargy, somnambulism, and catalepsy. In the last two days, they have been introduced to methods such as Ghigi, Lafontaine, and Trabona for regression, heightened reactions, and pain management. Now, in the last day of the course, they will learn advanced techniques such as Distant Magnetism, Self-Magnetism, and Magnetic Massage.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the COURSE LEVEL ONE Swiss VERSION offers a comprehensive introduction to various hypnotic techniques such as magnetic passes, catalepsy, mirror exercises, and regression. The course also covers different states of animal magnetism and provides useful exercises to improve the overall health and well-being of individuals. With an emphasis on practical applications, participants are equipped with effective methods to induce presence, induce regression, heal with magnetism, and manage compulsions. Overall, this course serves as an excellent foundation for those interested in exploring the field of hypnosis and its various applications.
